mapper.insert: insert into http_sample (workspaceId, orderNumber, name, method, url, headers, body, assertions, enabled) values (#{workspaceId}, #{orderNumber}, #{name}, #{method}, #{url}, #{headers,typeHandler=com.bomber.handler.HttpHeaderListHandler}, #{body}, #{assertions, typeHandler=com.bomber.handler.AssertionListHandler}, ${enabled})
mapper.update: update http_sample set name = #{name}, method = #{method}, url = #{url}, headers = #{headers,typeHandler=com.bomber.handler.HttpHeaderListHandler}, body = #{body}, assertions = #{assertions, typeHandler=com.bomber.handler.AssertionListHandler}, enabled = #{enabled} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from http_sample where workspaceId = #{wordspaceId} order by orderNumber
